Member.Name: Enable
Member.Description: 0 - Disable 1 - Enable the command: Trigger allowed one and only. 2 - Enable the command: Polling and trigger allowed only. 3 - Enable the command. 4 - Enable the command

Member.Name: Mode
Member.Description: Node address of the target device network (1–255).

Member.Name: Function
Member.Description: Function code for the command. 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 15 and 16 and 17 allowed for master and slave architecture. 30 allowed for slave only.
